answer: <p>You could probably use AOP to create some sort of Aspect that cached the results of our getters for a configurable amount of time. This would prevent you from needing to copy-and-paste boilerplate code in dozens of accessors.</p>

<p>I would also advice using such Framework as Primefaces instead of stock JSF,  they address such issues before JSF team e. g in primefaces you can set partial submit. Otherwise BalusC has explained it well. </p>
data.title: Why JSF calls getters multiple times
